sentences.en: And the white - handed is not clean in the doings of the felon.
sentences.cn: 无辜者对暴虐之徒的罪行也不是清清白白.

sentences.en: By law, convicted felons (= criminals who are sent to prison ) may not own or use guns.
sentences.cn: 按照法律，已判刑的重罪犯不能持有或使用枪支。

sentences.en: He was convicted to be a felon.
Here the hero is decorated. Here the felon is condemned.
sentences.cn: 在这里英雄授誉;在这里罪犯受罚.

sentences.en: I found out my ex - partner's a liar and a felon.
sentences.cn: 我发现我的超级 搭档 是个惯于说谎者.

sentences.en: Nichols also was convicted of hiding a corpse and a felon a firearm.
sentences.cn: 尼科尔斯还被判藏匿尸体及身为犯罪嫌犯藏有枪械.

sentences.en: Since when is capturing a felon considered interference?
sentences.cn: 从何时起抓住重案犯被认为是妨碍组员行动?

sentences.en: That felon tried to escape from the prison.
sentences.cn: 那名重罪犯试图从监狱中逃跑.

sentences.en: The felon slipped out the main prison gate, to be swallowed up in the British fog.
sentences.cn: 这个罪犯偷偷逃出了监狱大门, (结果)淹没在伦敦的大雾中.

sentences.en: The judge demanded the most severe punishment for the convicted felon.
sentences.cn: 法官正式请求给予宣告有罪的重犯最严重的惩罚.

trans.tran_cn: 重罪犯，瘭疽，甲沟炎，指头脓炎
trans.tran_en: someone who is guilty of a serious crime
